original_text: The first thing that you should understand is this. In the last days of this world, some people will laugh at you because you believe in God. These people will do whatever bad things they want to do.
korean_text: 먼저 이것을 알지니 말세에 조롱하는 자들이 와서 자기의 정욕을 따라 행하며 조롱하여

sentences.original_text: The first thing that you should understand is this
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이해해야 할 첫 번째 것은 이것이다

sentences.original_text: In the last days of this world
some people will laugh at you
whatever bad things they want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하고 싶은 어떤 나쁜 일이든지
